General.Name: Shaanxi Meibang Pharmaceutical Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shaanxi Meibang Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of agrochemicals. Its products include fungicides and insecticides. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Xi'an, China.
General.Address: High-tech Industrial Development Zone, Weinan, China, 715500
